with recursive cte (OBJ_PARENT, OBJ_NAME, OBJ_DEPTH, PATH) as ( SELECT CAST(0 AS char(100)) AS OBJ_PARENT, TABLE_NAME AS OBJ_NAME, '0' AS OBJ_DEPTH, TABLE_NAME as PATH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'test' union all SELECT a.TABLE_NAME AS OBJ_PARENT, CONCAT(a.COLUMN_NAME,' ', a.COLUMN_TYPE) AS OBJ_NAME, '1' AS OBJ_DEPTH, CONCAT(cte.PATH, ',', a.TABLE_NAME) AS PATH from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns AS a inner join cte on a.TABLE_NAME = cte.OBJ_NAME where table_schema='test' ) select * from cte WHERE 1=1
AND OBJ_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sTableNm}, '%') OR PATH LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sTableNm}, '%')
order by path
